SELECT DISTINCT (t.ID) goodId FROM t_esp_goods_base_info t LEFT JOIN t_esp_category c ON ( t.category_id1 = c.id OR t.category_id2 = c.id OR t.category_id3 = c.id ) WHERE ( t.goods_name LIKE '%${goodsName}%' OR c.category_name LIKE '%${goodsName}%' ) AND t.`status` = 'G02' AND t.is_delete = '01' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > t.list_time AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP < t.delist_time
ORDER BY t.list_time DESC
ORDER BY t.newCreat_date DESC
ORDER BY t.newCreat_date ASC
limit #{page, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rows, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.ID) FROM t_esp_goods_base_info t LEFT JOIN t_esp_category c ON ( t.category_id1 = c.id OR t.category_id2 = c.id OR t.category_id3 = c.id ) WHERE ( t.goods_name LIKE '%${goodsName}%' OR c.category_name LIKE '%${goodsName}%' ) AND t.`status` = 'G02' AND t.is_delete = '01' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > t.list_time AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP < t.delist_time

SELECT DISTINCT (t.ID) goodId FROM t_esp_goods_base_info t LEFT JOIN t_esp_category c ON ( t.category_id1 = c.id OR t.category_id2 = c.id OR t.category_id3 = c.id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id id, goods_id goods_id, SUM(sales_num) sales_num FROM t_esp_goods_sales_volume GROUP BY goods_id ) s ON t.id = s.goods_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.goods_id goods_id, m.id id, n.minprice goods_price FROM t_esp_goods_stock_info m, ( SELECT goods_id goodsId, MIN(goods_price) minprice FROM t_esp_goods_stock_info GROUP BY goods_id ) n WHERE m.goods_id = n.goodsId AND m.goods_price = n.minprice GROUP BY m.goods_id ) b ON t.id = b.goods_id WHERE ( t.goods_name LIKE '%${goodsName}%' OR c.category_name LIKE '%${goodsName}%' ) AND t.`status` = 'G02' AND t.is_delete = '01' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > t.list_time AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP < t.delist_time
ORDER BY b.goods_price DESC
ORDER BY b.goods_price ASC
limit #{page, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rows, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.id goodId, b.id goodsStockId, a.goods_name goodsName, a.goods_title goodsTitle, a.goods_logo_url goodsLogoUrl, a.source source FROM t_esp_goods_base_info a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id id, goods_id goods_id, SUM(sales_num) sales_num FROM t_esp_goods_sales_volume GROUP BY goods_id ) c ON a.id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.goods_id goods_id, m.id id, n.minprice goods_price FROM t_esp_goods_stock_info m, ( SELECT goods_id goodsId, MIN(goods_price) minprice FROM t_esp_goods_stock_info GROUP BY goods_id ) n WHERE m.goods_id = n.goodsId AND m.goods_price = n.minprice GROUP BY m.goods_id ) b ON a.id = b.goods_id WHERE a.id=#{value}
